lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods reported Friday that he was no longer on crutches since surgery last week on his left knee but added in his monthly newsletter that he did not know when he would return. “I knew a couple of months ago I was going to have the surgery,” Woods said. “The knee has been bugging me for a while. The only decision was do you miss the Masters or play in the Masters? I decided to play. Even if I had won, I still would have had the surgery.”.
